definition: a slow mode of locomotion on hands and knees or dragging the body, to move slowly
details:
noun
- a slow mode of locomotion on hands and knees or dragging the body
= synonyms: crawl
- a pen that is fenced so that young animals can enter but adults cannot
- a slow longitudinal movement or deformation
- someone unpleasantly strange or eccentric
= synonyms: spook, weirdo, weirdie, weirdy
verb
- to move slowly
= example: to move slowly
= synonyms: crawl
- to go stealthily or furtively
= example: to go stealthily or furtively
= synonyms: mouse, sneak, pussyfoot
- to grow or spread, often in such a way as to cover a surface
= example: to grow or spread, often in such a way as to cover a surface
- to show submission or fear
= synonyms: crawl
